Module com.groupthree.mancala
Package com.groupthree.mancala.gameplay

Class Hole

java.lang.Object
com.groupthree.mancala.gameplay.Hole
public class Hole extends Object
A class representing a hole on the mancala board, which can contain a list of stones.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yebo
